Name: Ink No. 1
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This simple, appropriately named drink is surprisingly quaffable.
History: Created in 2002 by Gentian Naci at Bar Epernay, Birmingham, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Ink No. 1 contains 178 calories
